description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.XrBOn1MueVB4u5sV]{Nanocyte Knack}

Your ability to strike from multiple angles out of your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.KOxmSWm5D1jHy8VU]{nanite cloud} improves even further. While youâ€™re adjacent to or within your nanite cloud, your reach with melee attacks made with weapons formed with your @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.LLNp1urkLncOxgsb]{gear array} gain additional reach of 10 feet. You can also make attacks of opportunity against any targets that would provoke them within your nanite cloud. You must have the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.UGAnfX50GvYnjFiX]{menacing pall} nanites knack to select this knack.
